Replies.Reply: Did Max mention anything about any jobs?
What about it?
You said if you didn't have a winning record after eleven fights, you'd talk to Max.
So, it was a draw.
So, it's not a winning record.
That's not what you said. You said if you didn't have a winning record-
How am I being shitty?
I wouldn't keep bugging you, but you said he said he would have a job for us.
Of course I don't want you to bring it up to him... But if it comes up...
Yeah. Page me. You know the number?
Cause if you don't know the number, I can page you with the number so you'll have the number.
I'll page you with the number. I'll see you later. What time you done?
Ask if he said anything to her.
I'll page you with the number.
I do. It's a fuckin Persian Palace.
Fuck them.
You see that, bro? She wants to fuck me.
Hey, baby... Nothing.  What are you doing..? Yeah, I'll probably cut out early...
We need guns.
I think we might.
He implied it.
This is the opportunity of a lifetime. What are you? Nuts? You've been waiting for this kind of opportunity.
Damn right, I have. You think I like living on fucking Yucca? We do a good job on this, we're in.
Shit. Who we kidding? I know I suck, and I held you up for ten rounds-
Please. I got three inches on you.
I'll beat your ass-
Sorry coach.
What about me coach? Did I have heart?
We'll kill Fairfax this year.
Fuck him.
What are we delivering?
Who is this fucking Ruiz?
Some Mexican? How much could he weigh? A buck fifty, tops? I'd kick his fucking ass.
Why do you always get stuck taking care of the kid.
It's not even yours.
Shhh...
Yeah, yeah... No. No. I'll be there.
You gotta get me to the Magic Castle at four.
I tried your ATM PIN. I gotta kill an hour. Let's grab a beer.
No, man. It wrinkles my shit. Let's grab a fuckin beer-
Jesus Christ, fine. Alright?
Let's grab a beer.
Why can't we just grab a goddamn beer.
Oh, give me a break. Look at her.
Why not? I grew up in bars. It's fun for a kid.
Why? You serve food?
Could you believe this shit? Fine.
Surprise me.
What? Did she say something?
I'm not painting the fu-, I'm not painting the ashtray. And frogs aren't purple.
Fine. Here, look. I'm painting.
Who's driving her?
This paint sucks. The white shows through.
Right here's fine.
She really liked the kitchen.
Can I borrow a piece of-
We're going to New York?
And the money. Where do we bring the money?
And where do we bring it?
To keep?
Yeah.
Keys.
What about my keys?
Yes.
I get it.
Don't worry. I get it.
You want... Why are you picking on me?
So, wait, what are we dropping off?
Holy shit. Can you believe this?
See, man. Maxie fuckin takes care of you when you're in. Beats cleaning carpets.
I'll get the girl.
Yeah, uh, what's the movie?
Ugh...
Yeah, sure. How much are they?
The videos.
Drinks are free, right?
Yes.
Unless we're supposed to whack out the fuckin' pilot, I don't think we're gonna have to work in the next five hours.
Oh, I'll represent alright.
Where do you live?
Where do you live?

Yeah. Me and my boy here are gonna be in New York overnight. I want you to pass the word around to the honeys back in business class that you all got plans for tonight. I'm talkin' a California style, Tupac, gangster pool party back at the hotel. And make that drink a double.
Maybe we should call for a cab.
You sure?
Ricky.
Is it nice?
Yeah.
Yeah.
Holy shit.
So whenever we want...
So you're our own private guy?
You know my pager number?
I don't know. I thought you might.
Just give me the key. I'm gonna stay here.
Is it a good room?
Just tell me. Wait, here... Do you have change of a hundred?
Here. Take it. Bring me back eighty.
Yeah. Take it.
So?
Is it the good room?
Come on. Just tell me. It'll save all the trouble of you showing me all the rooms.
What if I gave you forty?
No. That's cool. Bring me back eighty.
Where's the place to go tonight?
Nightlife. Where's the hot ass?
Yeah 'women.' If I was a fag I could get laid in a subway.
Don't worry about me getting in.
See you later.
Shhh... Hello, room service?
Yeah, bring up two burgers and a couple of Heinekens.  I'm in room...
How much? Okay. Make it fifteen minutes and you can add on a ten dollar tip. Bye.
Forty-six.
Yeah, I guess.
Relax. You got one-fifty. You heard the guy.
Fine. I'll put it on my room. Okay?
But let me tell you, man, I don't like your attitude already.
We just got moved up in the world.
Don't play dumb. You know what I'm talking about.
What are you doing?
As a matter of fact I was. You got a problem with that?

You think Maxie doesn't want us to roll hard? Why do you think he gave us all this bread? Or the number on the pager? We gotta represent him by showing some class. The man's got an operation. How does it reflect on him if we nickel and dime it?
Well, I don't want to walk.
... How 'bout Jimmy? You know Jimmy the driver? Cardiff Giant? You ever deal with them? Cardiff Giant?
Horseshit. 'Try the China Club.
He'll call back!
Fuck...
What exactly did they say?
They didn't say an address?
Nothing else.
How'd they know who you were?
So they said more than the address.
This is bullshit, man.
Don't even start.
Look, man, I never met Ruiz, okay?
Sold it, stole it, whatever...
Oh, give me a break. Don't tell me you feel bad for the guy.
Relax. I'll do right by him. You know that.
You know he fucks all his girls, don't you?
Mean, that's what I heard-
You know this guy?
No. I'll take a strega.
Yeah. That fernet tastes like tar.
It's a digestif.
Fine. Bring me a Cynar.
Where's Spa.
How do you like that fucking moulinyan?
This shit's sketchy. Why do they drop us in the middle of nowhere to have the guy we're supposed to meet come meet us just to tell us we have to meet the same guy somewhere else?
Well, I thought you understood and I was just missing it.
Yeah, but you know Horrace. What did you get off him?
Yeah. What vibe?
Yo, fuck him, man. Calling us guineas...
A lot of Persians?
I call 'em wiggers.
So is this the drop?
He woulda told us right?
Watch out, man. Sorry. I'm on the list, man.
Hey, bro.
Yeah, but, we're good. You know what I mean?
Yeah. Ricky Slade.
Cardiff Giant?
Cardiff Giant. Just check.
Again with the fucking China Club!
Did you see that shit? Motherfucker.
You let in fucking Screech, dude?
Show me. Show me where it says Screech on the fucking list.
We don't know any drill. Nobody told us anything.
So we're working?
She poured it for-
How do you know it's not drugs?
You strapped?
It means you got a gun?
So, you must be the Red Dragon.
Mmmm-hmm. Where's the, uh, 'Dragon's lair?' Where do you live?
And where might that be?
Well, word on the street is you're Welsh.
A rose by any other name would--
Unless spoken to, ain't that right, Horrace. Didn't you say that?
He spoke to me. You want me to dis him?
Why? What I say bad?
What? Why am I bad?
You really in trouble?
I'll tell him someone else told me.
About what?
You too?
Fuck this.
Back in.
Work's over. I'm gonna party.
You got that right.
Fine.
Look who's back? Want some champagne?
Damn right. Bring us two bottles of Dom Champs and here, take fifty in case I call you bitch later when I'm drunk.
Siddown, motherfucker.
'Sex and paychecks.' They all clink.
Replies.Didascalie: (he pours him a glass and toasts)

Replies.Reply: So, wait, you're from where?
You girls aren't from Brooklyn or anything?
I don't get it. What do you do?
So you're models?
And you grew up in Manhattan?
I don't know about you guys, but I'm starting to feel a really sexual vibe here.

Look at, ladies. I could sit here and take turns throwing skittles at your ass all night. But I feel what you guys are putting out there. I'm only a mirror reflecting what I'm getting from you. And I'm saying yes to it. I'm shaking hands with it. I see the road that you're pointing down and I'm saying I'll ride shotgun. And when your foot slams on the accelerator, I won't get scared.
I don't wear a white wig, I don't carry a gavel.
Now you girls wait here. I got a special surprise.
Dude, get back out there. You gotta help me get them in the hot tub.
Hang on girls! Just get out there.
Okay. We got a lot happening here.
You want your surprise?
Well, come on then. It's back here.
You want to come splash around.
I didn't do anything--
I swear to God, I didn't do anything.
She was jonesing for me.
What's up?
Where?
We're getting whacked.
Why else you think he won't tell us where the sit down is?
I got a bad feeling, man. I don't want to go in naked.
Is it so unrealistic to think Ruiz, who doesn't even want us here, is throwing us to the wolves? As an apology? And I don't even know what we're dropping off or picking up -
C'mon, man...
Hey, Jimmy, where they taking us?
No...
He has a cute what..?
Who's gonna outfit us?
You want us strapped, don't you?
The Red Dragon.
So, we're talking money laundering...
I'm your soldier.
Yeah.
When all this is over and we're not working for Maxie, I'd love to run into you on the street.
Why aren't you coming?
So we just go eat with him and that's gonna solve everything?
Like you were doing any better shucking and jiving like you were waiting for wings outside the Quick and Split.
Let's check out the penguins.
The penguin house.
Yeah. Let's look at the penguins.
Whatever. We're here. We may as well go to the penguin house.
We need guns.
I'm pretty sure we do.
All the more reason.
Wanna bet?
That's cause you decided to get all tired all of a sudden.
Float me a hundred bucks.
You wanna see how fast I get a gun?
No.
Eighty.
Eighty five.
You coulda picked up a tab every once in a while.
You did?
What about it?
Calm down.
This shit's peanuts compared to what we're gonna make with Maxie.
I'm sorry...
It's gonna be fine.
Let's get some sleep. That's what we need, man. Sleep.
So what do we do?
Three and a half hours?
Let's just go get guns, I'd feel better.

Think about it: You knocked out that Jewish kid's tooth, cost him eight grand, maybe more. Maybe lost his whole line of clientele? He knows you're fucking up Jess' dancing, and I got a feeling he knows I stole his carpet cleaning van by the way he looks at me. He can't kill us in LA cause that leads to too many questions. So he flies us out here first class for a 'drop' that's turned into whatever? He can make us disappear out here real nice...
Scenario B. I think I'm getting under Ruiz's skin. I'm no dummy. He doesn't like how it went down with the Red Drag- Welshman, whatever.
Hi Princess. It's Ricky. I hope you're doing good sweety. Everyone's okay. Nobody's hurt... Talk to you soon. Bye.
Look. They're together. You telling me this ain't a set-up?
Dip?
I'll get it.
Ow, shit...
I'm half Irish.
Get up brother. We're home. Go up and get some sleep.
Or maybe I'm real lucky. I'll tell you one thing, I'll waste every bullet making sure you're dead if you don't take that knife away from my friends throat.
What?
Are you willing to risk your life over-
Holy shit. Get me back to Manhattan.
But, Max-
Yes, sir.
Dude, we were practically made...
No. I'll wait here.
Baby, you got the sweetest voice I ever heard, but Uncle Ricky's gotta sleep. I've been driving all night, Princess.
What about boxing?
What are you saying?
So?
It's not losing record.
Don't be shitty.
Don't be shitty.
I'm not gonna bring it up to him.
I'll page you.
Yeah. I know the number.
I know the number.
I got no idea.
I will.
Bye.
Honey?
So, what kind of gig is this?
No. What kind of bachelor party?
A draw. What makes you think they're well mannered?
I don't like you working with Wendy. Why are you working with Wendy?
Some favor. I hope they know you're not like Wendy.
If they asked for her, they're probably expecting blowjobs all around.
Who's watching the baby?
I'm ready.
They're not too classy to have tits rubbed in their face.
You talk to Max today?
Don't expect you to mention it to him. I'm just saying, if-
Well, that's not gonna happen.
I feel weird asking him.
I just wish he never brought it up.
No coke tonight.
Right?
Johnny Red rocks.
I had a fight up at Sportsman's.
Draw.
Yeah, sure.
There's no touching.
I don't give a shit. I work for her. No touching.
I said no touching.
Get your hands off of her.
Your dance is over.
You wanna get us busted? If Max found out you were turning tricks-
Bullshit.
No more.
Nobody's fuckin talking to you.
I got news for you, Horrace got his ass out of there before you did.
What? You don't think Horrace would leave your white ass in there to hang?
I thought you hate that club.
Then why do you try to get in?
Shhh...
Come on, man. Not with the owners here.
What are you talking about?
They were grabbing her fucking ass-
Do me a favor, Arthur, keep him on til I see what's happening.
Hi, uh, excuse me. I'm here to see Mr. Reuben.
Yeah.
No thank you.
No, thank you. I'm good. Thanks.
Sure. Yeah.
Me? No. Not really.
Why?
This one?
Pshhh...
She was fast, huh?
That's why they call it the smart money.
Mr. Reuben, I swear to God, they were out of line.
They were out of line-
That prick tried to get Jessica to blow him in the bathroom-
I'll work it off.
What?
So, that's it. I'm out?
Then what are you saying?
I don't understand.
Don't want to drive another girl, Max. The only reason I'm -
No.
I know.
Yeah. Sorry.
Yeah.
Ruiz knows about this?
What about Ricky? He'd jump at the opportunity.
You told him you liked him.
He'll work it off.
He's good people, Mr. Reuben. I swear.
Yeah. Sure.
I gotta tell you, Mr. Reuben, I'm not comfortable getting in any deeper. It's one thing to look after Jess...
It's not that I don't appreciate the offer...
No. Okay. I'll think about it.
We don't need guns.
He didn't say we need guns.
You don't imply about something like that. You lay it out on the table. Besides, I'm not taking the job.
No. You've been waiting for this kind of opportunity.
What happened to boxing? I thought we made a vow.
Bullshit...
You wanna go right now?
Sorry coach.
Great.
We look good this year.
I still can't believe you missed the fucking team bus.
Your first start at DB, it's against Fairfax, and you miss the fucking bus.
We're not delivering shit. Ruiz is delivering something, and whatever it is is his business.
Maxie says he runs a tight ship. I wouldn't fuck with him.
I gotta pick up the baby.
I like it.
I like it.
Nice work.
How'd you unlock my phone?
Seat belt.
Ricky, can you put on a seat belt?
C'mon, man, not in front of the baby. Put on your seat belt before I get another ticket.
See? Now everyone's got one on.
She's, uh, sleeping.
Mommy works hard so you can have all your pretty clothes. Don't you like your pretty clothes?
Show uncle Ricky what you made.
I promised Chloe we'd come here.
I'm not taking her to a bar.
What's wrong, baby?
She wants you to paint the ashtray.
Will you paint the damn thing. Why do you gotta be such a baby.
Max won't let me drive Jess to dance anymore.
I don't know.
Is that the woman from..?
Go finish getting ready. I'll take care of dinner.
Go.

You better watch everything I'm doing. You know why? Because that's how you learn to cook. I watched my grandma cook every night. That's how I learned. If you can't cook, then you gotta go out to eat every night, then you spend all your money on food. And when you eat in restaurants, the cooks scratch their ass and touch the food.
You driving her?
She'll be out in a minute.
Watch your mouth in front of the baby.
No way that cocksucker's driving you.
Maxie's fucking with me. He put you with the spook to get under my skin.
Ho's a fucking pimp! He encourages Wendy to turn tricks. And she's his fucking wife!
Good! It'll save me the trouble of repeating myself. He's not fucking driving you!
I want you to quit.
I'll support you.
Max offered to stake me.
She needs a family. A dad. I'll give her what you never had.
Get away from her.
It's ours.
Yeah.
Yes.
You want-
Already told you, I parked it for five minutes and I locked it with the club-
You want us to be wherever you want us to be, ASAP, no questions asked.
Pretty nice.
What's the movie?
Nah, don't bother-
We're not supposed to get drunk.
I don't want to show up hammered.
Cut that shit out.
Shit. No new pages. I don't even know where the fuck we're supposed to go.
No. Look. There.
Yeah. He said that's our account with the car service.
Bobby.
What's that?
I'm not sure. All I know is the account is Cardiff Giant.
Nah.
Where is the Soho Grand?
Thanks.
Yeah, take care.
Hi girls, It's Bobby. I'm here safe and sound. I'm just calling to say I love you. I'd leave my number, but you know you can't call me here, so I'll try you later. Uncle Ricky wants to say hi...
He says hi. Be home soon. Love you.
C'mon, man...
How much is it?
How much was it?
Jesus, man. Plus ten?
Great. On my fucking room.
Ricky, who knows how long we're gonna have to be here. We gotta make it last.
Don't worry about it. Just be smart.
Oh really. Why's that?
Who's gonna smell me a mile away?
What are you doing?
I know you're not calling Jimmy.
We're here representing Max. You're acting like a Puerto Rican on the fifteenth of the month.
It's on West Broadway. We can walk.
Hello? Shit...
Excuse me, we need to make a call.
It's important.
Listen, man, we really gotta...
Shit. It's thirty-five cents. You got a dime?
So, Jimmy, you know where this address is?
Harlem? What is it, a restaurant?
No. Just the cross streets.
No. That's cool, man.
They said a hundred thirty-fifth and Twelfth.
I told you what they said.
Nothing.
They asked who it was.
No. They asked who I was, then told me what corner.
What the fuck do you...
No. Tell me. What's so fucking horrible about this gig? You've been crawling up my ass for six months to get your name on Maxie's list, and here we are.
You sold it? I thought they stole it.
Motherfucker...
You gotta be kidding me. I vouched for you.
You just don't fucking get it, do you?
What the fuck is that supposed-
You got something to say-
His names Horrace. Horrace, this is Ricky Slade.
Yeah. Where is he?
I don't know.
Missing what? He didn't say shit.
I detected no vibe other than that Ruiz thinks you're a fucking idiot.
What do you give a shit what he calls us? He's not our friend. Let's just get this shit over with and go home. What's this place we're going to, Jimmy?
Yeah.
This Ruiz guy, what's his deal?
Yeah?
Yeah.
Like I said, I don't know.
You would think.
We're with Ruiz.
We're supposed to meet him here. Is Ruiz on the list?
Can you check?
Thanks a lot. Don't worry about it.
Thanks.
What drill?
Yeah.
He making the drop?
What's his name?
So, when's the drop.
We get it. We're sorry.
How bad is it?
When's it going down?
Shit.
You happy?
Why you gotta make everything difficult?
Yeah, me too. You're a fucking bull in a china shop.
Where do you think you're going?
You fucking nuts?
You can't go in there. They know you're with Ruiz.
Fuck you. Go then. I'm taking the car.
Do not put this on Ruiz's tab.
Can you excuse me for a minute?

Yeah, I know how you do. I know how you do. I've heard your kibbles and bits all fucking night. You've been shaking your ass like an unemployed clown. How the room's a boiling pot of sugar water. How you're gonna dip a string into it and make rockcandy.
What the hell did you do?
What the fuck was that about?
Here you go, darling. Get home safe.
He wants to see us now.
He said it's being arranged. He said Jimmy will know.
We're not getting whacked.
It's not a 'sit down.' He said he's telling us the plan.
You gonna shank him in the shower?
We're getting ahead of ourselves.
Put that shit out...
I swear to God, I'll fucking puke.
Yeah. Where they gonna whack us?
Good morning.
Easy, Ruiz.
Nah, man...
A bad heart.
Nothing, man.
What's the plan?
Let's do it.
Where's the drop?
Why isn't Ruiz coming?
What's that?
Yeah.
So what do we do?
Where is this happening?
The what?
Wait a minute. You want to look at fucking penguins now?
Did you hear what he just said?
I'm tired and I'm scared, and I'm not looking at fucking penguins.
We don't need guns.
I listened extremely carefully.
You wouldn't even know where to get one.
You couldn't even get a hand job from bridge and tunnel posse, how you gonna get a gun?
It was six in the fucking morning.
Why?
You're out of money?
What do you have left?
Eighty bucks?!?
What happened to the fifteen hundred?
I did! I paid for half the fuckin drinks!
Yes I did. You asshole! What about the room?
They only cover one fifty in incidentals. You've been ordering fucking... Motherfucker...
I fucking vouched for you. I vouched for you and you fucked me.
Ricky. I'm trying to save this money. Understand? I'm trying to make it so my girlfriend doesn't have to grind her ass into other men's erections so her daughter can go to private school.
This is horseshit. It coulda been so easy.
No more, man.
How we gonna sleep? We only got a few hours til dinner.
Let's just go now and wait.
I don't want to take any more chances.
Don't fuck around. You're gonna get us all killed.
Where do you get this shit?
You're not getting a gun.
Hi girls. It's Bobby. Can't seem to get a hold of you. Gonna be home soon. I miss you. Chloe, Uncle Ricky's here. He wants to say hello.
Easy...
Tom. How's it going?
Bobby and Ricky.
C'mon...
No.
Yeah?
Ruiz tied in out there?
Heard of them.

It sounds to me like everybody's just a little jumpy. And since all it is is a drop, the Welshman's got nothing at stake. I say we go to his 'troughed off' bar. It'll calm his nerves, we drop the bag, and we all get back to our lives.
Chloe?
Hi, baby. What are you doing awake?
Mommy's not home?
What time is it there?
Yeah. Are you sure mommy's not home? It's very late.
Yeah..? Now..? Did Ricky call yet..? See you in a minute.
Aren't we waiting for Ricky?
Taken care of?
Where we going?
Where's Ricky?
How so?
That it?
Where's Ricky.
Take us right to Kennedy. Now.
There won't be a next thing.
I don't need a few days. I'm gonna settle down with Jess. She's through dancing. We're opening a restaurant.
She's through too. Thank you for the opportunity, Max. We'll see you around.
I'll drop you off in a minute. I want to see if the baby's up. You wanna come in?
I'll be a minute.
Where's mommy? Did she leave you alone again?
I don't get it.
How could you let her see this?
Just so you know, I bought you out with Maxie. I suggest you leave while you can.
Tell you the truth, I don't give a shit for me. But that little girl is so special, and you're gonna fuck her up.
What'd you say?
I, uh ... Listen, hon. Mommy thinks it's a good idea if, just for a while, if you and me go on a trip-
Easy night. Bachelor party. Can we give Wendy a ride?
The easy kind. They're young and rich and well mannered.
Bobby, this is a plumb gig. It's a bunch of young agents and it's at a restaurant. It's gonna be easy and we'll make a lot of money.
They requested her. It was her gig.
Oh, please.
Will you cut it out! Get ready, we're already late.
She's downstairs with Ruth. Get ready.
Bullshit. These are classy customers. You can't show up all fucked up with a Fila running suit on.
Stop. I love you.
I'm not gonna mention Ricky to him.
The only way he'll go with Ricky is if you're in too.
Fine. You want to help Ricky, talk to Maxie yourself.
You shouldn't. He likes you.
Forget Ricky. You should be glad Max got you driving for me.
Leave me alone. I haven't touched anything in months.
God damn it...
Bobby...
Alright. Enough already. Let's get some food. I better call Maxie and tell him what happened before he hears it on his own.
Here, sweety, mommy's in a hurry.
Mommy has to work.
Here, sweety. Don't be a little shit.
Yeah? You sure?
Hiya Ho. Come in. I'll just be a minute.
Bobby's cooking. He's the best.
Maybe if you didn't go Rambo every time I did a lapdance, you'd still be doing it yourself. Meantime, I gotta feed my little girl.
Ho's a good guy-
Shhh. He'll hear you.
Listen to me, Bobby. This is my job. It puts a roof over me and my daughter and you for as long as you want to stay.
Look at the bills. I can't. I'm not gonna put my daughter through what I went through.
With what?
Yeah, well Max offers a lot of things. And I got news for you. He's not the sweet old man you think he is.
Don't get my hopes up. If I quit, what then? I can't go through this again.
C'mon, Ho. We're late.
I never promised you anything.
Goodbye, Bobby.
Don't you get it? I don't want to leave. This is who I am.
Take her.
I want you to take her with you.
May I help..?
Did you get the license plate of the truck?
Snifter are for warm drinks-
When served warm-
That's not allowed.
Martel's and coke. One ice cube. In a snifter this time.
Yeah, snifters are for cognac-
What's the matter? You ain't got no snifters in this motherfucker?
Then put my Martel's in a snifter.
Well, you look it. You win?
What's your record at?
Yeah, well you let me know when you wanna start makin the real money.
I'm serious. Humping sheetrock and driving on weekends got to get to you after a while. Might be nice to buy your lady something. All it takes is one fight.
What's up? Jess ready?
Yeah.
Some shit smells good in this motherfucker.
Yeah. Whip me up something. I'm hungry as a motherfucker.
C'mon girl. Eat up.
Excuse--
Yeah. We got money to make. See you around, Bobby. You make a good puttanesca. Mmmmm-mmmm. You should make that shit for a living.
What's up. You all ready to meet Ruiz?
Yeah.
Jimmy knows. 13th Street. We'll meet you there.
Nah, man. He's just making contact.
Ruiz don't like using names on cell phones. He refers to him as the Red Dragon.
To be honest, man, I don't know shit either. All I know is it ain't drugs and it ain't now.
Maxie knows I don't go near drugs.
